TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UrlBuilder extends System.Object

summary.span: 啟動 URL 編輯器以允許使用者選取或建立 URL。

span.span: Starts a URL editor that allows a user to select or create a URL.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會啟動選取的 URL 的使用者介面。The method starts a user interface for selecting a URL. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以在設計階段中啟動的 URL 產生器，從功能表命令。The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. [!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]

summary.span: 建立 UI，以建立或挑選 URL。

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

MemberSignature.Value: public static string BuildUrl (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter);

.method public static hidebysig string BuildUrl(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, class System.Windows.Forms.Control owner, string initialUrl, string caption, string filter) cil managed
Public Shared Function BuildUrl (component As IComponent, owner As Control, initialUrl As String, caption As String, filter As String) As String

public: static System::String ^ BuildUrl(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::Windows::Forms::Control ^ owner, System::String ^ initialUrl, System::String ^ caption, System::String ^ filter);

param.name: component
param.span: 的站台是用來存取設計階段服務。

span.span: The whose site is to be used to access design-time services.

param.name: owner
param.span: 當做選擇器視窗父代 (Parent) 使用的 。

span.span: The used as the parent for the picker window.

param.name: initialUrl
param.span: 要顯示於 [選擇器] 視窗中的初始 URL。

span.span: The initial URL to be shown in the picker window.
The caption of the picker window.

param.name: filter
param.span: 篩選條件字串，用來選擇性地篩選顯示於選擇器視窗中的檔案。

span.span: The filter string to use to optionally filter the files displayed in the picker window.

summary.span: 建立 UI，以建立或挑選 URL。

span.span: Creates a UI to create or pick a URL.

returns.span: 從 UI 傳回的 URL。

span.span: The URL returned from the UI.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以在設計階段中啟動的 URL 產生器，從功能表命令。The following code example shows how to use the method to launch a URL builder from a menu command at design time. [!code-cpp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CPP/urlbuilderdesigner.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/CS/urlbuilderdesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[UrlBuilderExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/UrlBuilderExample/VB/urlbuilderdesigner.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面用來取得設計工具主應用程式的實作。The interface is used to obtain the implementation for the designer host.
